Class Router

java.lang.Object
routerrental_package.Router
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
class Router
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Creates a new router. Single responsibility applied.

    • setModel

      public void setModel​(char model)
      Sets the model value. The function May throw inputError a user-defined exception if an invalid character is passed, which will cause it to call itself recursively until a valid input is provided.
      Parameters:
      model - The model type (a - z or A - Z).
